ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: at their ascription of a son to the All-Merciful!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For they have attributed a son to Ar-Rahman,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: at their ascribing a son to the Most Compassionate Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: to ascribe a son to the Beneficent God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Due to their ascribing of an offspring to the Most Gracious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That they ascribe a son to the Most Gracious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That they ascribe a son to the Beneficent Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that they have attributed to the All-merciful a son;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That ye ascribe unto the Beneficent a son,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: because they ascribe a son to the Gracious One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That they should ascribe unto the Compassionate a son. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that they should ascribe a son to the All-beneficent!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That they should invoke a son for (Allah) Most Gracious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That they ascribe a son (or offspring or children) to the Most Beneficent (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: because they have ascribed a son to the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Because they attribute a son to the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:91] that they have ascribed a son to the Compassionate One. God, exalted be He, says:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That ye ascribe unto the Beneficent a son) Ezra,
